short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hotel Search dialog for 200,000 hotels worldwide

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hotel search dialog for Booking.com hotels.

It allows simple and fast search for hotels directly from your browser's toolbar, without the need to navigate to your travel search engine.
